name: VOSS Turbo Demo
description:
Charge through 30 quirky, abstract stages, in this 5th generation inspired twin stick space shooter.

Navigate this unconventional universe, with branching paths to uncover it's many secrets.

Dynamic difficulty will keep gameplay fresh as you unlock new challenges and power ups along your ever evolving journey.

You could even bring a buddy into the mix for some couch co-op action! Tons of bosses, tons of enemies, and tons of ways to play!
